name: Ice Elemental
movement: burrow 30 ft., climb 20 ft., walk 30 ft.
description: The Ice Elemental is a large, imposing creature composed of ice and frost, exhibiting exceptional durability and strength, along with notable ice-based abilities.
memorable: Its ability to encase foes in ice and move effortlessly across icy terrain makes it a dangerous opponent.
goals: Typically found in cold environments, aiming to protect its icy domain from intruders.
relations: Often associated with other elemental beings, particularly those of ice or water.
environment: Cold terrains, such as icy mountains or frozen landscapes.
strengths: Immunity to cold and poison damage, resistance to non-magical attacks except for fire.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, rendering it susceptible to fiery attacks.
attacks: Utilizes ice claws for slashing damage and has a retaliatory ability that damages attackers with ice shards.
most_powerful_ability: Encase in Ice can restrain and petrify opponents with ice, creating a strategic advantage in battle.
additional_information: Can glide through nonmagical ice without disturbance.
Moves freely across icy surfaces without slowing down.
Can retaliate against bludgeoning melee attacks with piercing ice damage.
test_queries: creature that moves through ice effortlessly
monster that encases enemies in ice
Large elemental immune to cold damage
vulnerable ice monster that hates fire
